article.headline: Facebook shares close above $300 per share for first time
article.body: Facebook Inc. FB, +0.26% shares closed up 8% to $303.91 in trading Wednesday as the social-networking giant surpassed the mark for the first time. Cowen analysts are particularly bullish on the company: On Tuesday, the firm set a street high price target of $330 on the stock. Facebook's stock is up 48% this year. The broader S&P 500 index SPX, +0.87% is up 7.7% this year.
